about_the_game:
Insane maze - is a psychological online horror game for 1-4 players in which you, alone or together with your friends, try to get out of the space maze. The maze contains various boxes with items, as well as a monster that you don't want to meet.

Unique gameplay: every game the maze is generated anew, so you never know in advance what awaits you on this map and what emotions this passage will give you.
Co-op multiplayer: play with your friends with up to 4 players, a brave and good team is the way to go exit.
Character Skills: Cooperate with your partners for survival, because this will give you opportunities that your character does not have.
Monster: reacts to all your actions, so you need to be quiet and inconspicuous.

short_description: Can you get out of the auto-generation insane maze alone or with friends? The maze is full of useless items for survival, what if they won't help you, but the monsters will overtake you!
